summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Employee incentive scheme (performance rights) issuance  
- **Performance Rights Issued**: 3,239,878 (MMIAO) on 23/06/2025  
  - **Key Management Personnel (KMP) Allocations**:  
    - Paul Lucas: 222,543  
    - Douglas Ritchie: 2,600,066  
    - Andrew Lloyd: 417,269  
- **Shareholder Approval**: Granted at 2025 AGM (meeting date: 23/05/2025)  
- **Total Unquoted Securities Outstanding Post-Issue**:  
  - Performance Rights (MMIAO): 235,983,435  
  - Subscription Warrants (MMIAP): 592,380,528  
- **Ordinary Shares Outstanding**: 6,098,121,030 (MMI)  

No material impact on trading liquidity or capital structure. Terms of the incentive scheme [here](https://metromining.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Employee-Incentive-Plan-2020.pdf).
